card.name: Absorb
card.text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Addle
card.text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: AEther Rift
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays 5 life.

card.name: Aggressive Urge
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Agonizing Demise
card.text: Kicker {1}{R} Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

card.name: Alabaster Leech
card.text: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.

card.name: Alloy Golem
card.text: As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color. Alloy Golem is the chosen color.

card.name: Ancient Kavu
card.text: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Spring
card.text: Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ancient Spring: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Andradite Leech
card.text: Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast. {B}: Andradite Leech gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Angelic Shield
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Annihilate
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

card.name: Archaeological Dig
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Archaeological Dig: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Ardent Soldier
Armadillo Cloak
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Armored Guardian
card.text: {1}{W}{W}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}: Armored Guardian gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Artifact Mutation
card.text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Assault // Battery
Atalya, Samite Master
card.text: {X}, {T}: Choose one - Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn; or you gain X life. Spend only white mana this way.

card.name: Aura Mutation
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that enchantment's converted mana cost.

card.name: Aura Shards
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Backlash
card.text: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

card.name: Barrin's Spite
card.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Their controller chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.

card.name: Barrin's Unmaking
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand if that permanent shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

card.name: Benalish Emissary
card.text: Kicker {1}{G} When Benalish Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target land.

card.name: Benalish Heralds
card.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Benalish Lancer
card.text: Kicker {2}{W} If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

card.name: Benalish Trapper
card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Bend or Break
card.text: Each player separates all nontoken lands he or she controls into two piles. For each player, one of his or her piles is chosen by one of his or her opponents of his or her choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

card.name: Bind
card.text: Counter target activated ability. Draw a card.

card.name: Blazing Specter
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Blind Seer
card.text: {1}{U}: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Bloodstone Cameo
card.text: {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Blurred Mongoose
card.text: Blurred Mongoose can't be countered. Shroud

card.name: Bog Initiate
card.text: {1}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Breaking Wave
card.text: You may cast Breaking Wave any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Simultaneously untap all tapped creatures and tap all untapped creatures.

card.name: Breath of Darigaaz
card.text: Kicker {2} Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

card.name: Callous Giant
card.text: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.

card.name: Canopy Surge
card.text: Kicker {2} Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If Canopy Surge was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

card.name: Capashen Unicorn

card.name: Captain Sisay
card.text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cauldron Dance
card.text: Cast Cauldron Dance only during combat. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step. You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Chaotic Strike
card.text: Cast Chaotic Strike only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Charging Troll
card.text: Vigilance {G}: Regenerate Charging Troll.

card.name: Chromatic Sphere

card.name: Cinder Shade
card.text: {B}: Cinder Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {R}, Sacrifice Cinder Shade: Cinder Shade deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Coalition Victory
card.text: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.

card.name: Coastal Tower
card.text: Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Collapsing Borders
card.text: Domain - At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains 1 life for each basic land type among lands he or she controls. Then Collapsing Borders deals 3 damage to him or her.

card.name: Collective Restraint
card.text: Domain - Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {X} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Cremate
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Crimson Acolyte
card.text: Protection from red {W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.

card.name: Crosis, the Purger

card.name: Crown of Flames
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

card.name: Crusading Knight

card.name: Crystal Spray
card.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Darigaaz, the Igniter
card.text: Flying Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Darigaaz's Attendant: Add {B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.

card.text: Separate all creature cards in your graveyard into two piles. Exile the pile of an opponent's choice and return the other to the battlefield.

card.name: Defiling Tears
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes black, gets +1/-1, and gains "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

card.text: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.

card.name: Restrain
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Reviving Dose
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Reviving Vapors
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Rewards of Diversity
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Reya Dawnbringer
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Riptide Crab
card.text: Vigilance When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.

card.name: Rith, the Awakener
card.text: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

card.name: Rith's Attendant
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Rogue Kavu
card.text: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Rooting Kavu
card.text: When Rooting Kavu dies, you may exile it. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Rout
card.text: You may cast Rout any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Ruby Leech
card.text: First strike Red spells you cast cost {R} more to cast.

card.name: Ruham Djinn
card.text: First strike Ruham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as white is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

card.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
card.text: Trample, protection from blue and from red

card.name: Salt Marsh
card.text: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Samite Archer
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Samite Ministration
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice. Whenever damage from a black or red source is prevented this way this turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Sapphire Leech
card.text: Flying Blue spells you cast cost {U} more to cast.

card.name: Saproling Infestation
card.text: Whenever a player kicks a spell, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Saproling Symbiosis
card.text: You may cast Saproling Symbiosis any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each creature you control.

card.name: Savage Offensive
card.text: Kicker {G} Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If Savage Offensive was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Scarred Puma
card.text: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.

card.name: Scavenged Weaponry
card.text: Enchant creature When Scavenged Weaponry enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

card.name: Scorching Lava
card.text: Kicker {R} Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Scorching Lava was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Scouting Trek
card.text: Search your library for any number of basic land cards. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it.

card.name: Searing Rays
card.text: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.

card.name: Seashell Cameo
card.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Seer's Vision
card.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed. Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Serpentine Kavu
card.text: {R}: Serpentine Kavu gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Shackles
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shimmering Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. {U}: Return Shimmering Wings to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shivan Emissary
card.text: Kicker {1}{B} When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shivan Harvest
card.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Shivan Oasis
card.text: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Shivan Zombie
card.text: Protection from white

card.name: Shoreline Raider
card.text: Protection from Kavu

card.name: Simoon
card.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Skittish Kavu
card.text: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

card.name: Skizzik
Sky Weaver
card.text: {2}: Target white or black creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Sleeper's Robe
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has fear. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Slimy Kavu
card.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.

card.name: Smoldering Tar
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life. Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: Smoldering Tar deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Soul Burn
card.text: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Sparring Golem
card.text: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Spinal Embrace
card.text: Cast Spinal Embrace only during combat. Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Spirit of Resistance
card.text: As long as you control a permanent of each color, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Spirit Weaver
card.text: {2}: Target green or blue creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Spite // Malice
Spreading Plague
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures that share a color with it. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Stalking Assassin
card.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature. {3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Stand // Deliver
Stand or Fall
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, separate all creatures defending player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of that player's choice can block this turn.

card.name: Sterling Grove
card.text: Other enchantments you control have shroud. {1}, Sacrifice Sterling Grove: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Stormscape Apprentice
card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

card.name: Stormscape Master
card.text: {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. {B}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Strength of Unity
card.text: Enchant creature Domain - Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Stun
card.text: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Sulam Djinn
card.text: Trample Sulam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as green is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

card.name: Sulfur Vent
card.text: Sulfur Vent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Sulfur Vent: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sunscape Apprentice
card.text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Sunscape Master
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. {U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sway of Illusion
card.text: Any number of target creatures become the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Tainted Well
card.text: Enchant land When Tainted Well enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is a Swamp.

card.name: Tangle
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Tectonic Instability
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, tap all lands its controller controls.

card.name: Teferi's Care
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment. {3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.

card.name: Teferi's Moat
card.text: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.

card.name: Teferi's Response
card.text: Counter target spell or ability an opponent controls that targets a land you control. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, destroy that permanent. Draw two cards.

card.name: Tek
card.text: Tek gets +0/+2 as long as you control a Plains, has flying as long as you control an Island, gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Swamp, has first strike as long as you control a Mountain, and has trample as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Temporal Distortion
card.text: Whenever a creature or land becomes tapped, put an hourglass counter on it. Each permanent with an hourglass counter on it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, remove all hourglass counters from permanents that player controls.

card.name: Thicket Elemental
card.text: Kicker {1}{G} When Thicket Elemental enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.

card.name: Thornscape Apprentice
card.text: {R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Thornscape Master
card.text: {R}{R}, {T}: Thornscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature. {W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Thunderscape Apprentice
card.text: {B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thunderscape Master

card.text: First strike, protection from legendary creatures {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target legendary creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Tsabo's Assassin
card.text: {T}: Destroy target creature if it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Tsabo's Decree
card.text: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Tsabo's Web
card.text: When Tsabo's Web enters the battlefield, draw a card. Each land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Turf Wound
card.text: Target player can't play land cards this turn. Draw a card.

card.text: You may cast Twilight's Call any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it. Each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Agenda
